Reviews.Title: “Complete Disgrace to the Hotel Industry”

Reviews.Content: arrived late night forced stay london 24 hour journey europe escaping consequences volcanic ash charged £60 curtain stank mould crud carpet shower dared wardrobe cupboards plenty stains bed sheets bad 24 hours travelling left 35 hour kip catch earliest escape paddington station
